results.title: Buttercup
results.creator_credit: Robert Leland Brown and Dimension Films
results.brief_description: This film presents without commentary an ecological story about a buttercup which floats down a mountain stream and ends up being swallowed in polluted industrial waters. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
results.description: This film presents without commentary an ecological story about a buttercup which floats down a mountain stream and ends up being swallowed in polluted industrial waters. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.

results.title: But first - this message
results.creator_credit: Yale Marc, Jim Herzig and Action for Children's Television
results.brief_description: Presents an analysis of commercial television programs for children, with excerpts from shows and commercials. Includes comments from professionals working with children and reactions from children.

results.title: Busy hands
results.creator_credit: A Bhaskarrao, M. Bhavnani and Films Division, Government of India
results.brief_description: This film shows villagers as they attend cottage industries classes held in their communities in which families learn weaving, rope making, tailoring, tanning and leather work, pottery and other useful trades. NB: Print unable to be screened due to shrinkage.

results.title: Busy bodies
results.brief_description: Discusses how exercise and movement contribute to good health and physical condition. Shows characteristic movement of a variety of animals, followed by children imitating those movements. Narrated by Vic Perrin. Suitable for primary and lower secondary levels.

results.title: Bustin
results.brief_description: Internet comedy and meme-generator extraordinaire Neil Cicierega (Potter Puppet Pals) creates a video / audio remix of Ray Parker Jnr’s classic film theme that isn’t soon forgotten.

constellations_other.name: Dragon's Lair
constellations_other.description: A look at pop-cultural interconnections that spawn from the lair of Don Bluth's arcade classic.

results.title: Business activity statement : your one report
results.brief_description: This video provides information about the new Business Activity Statement (BAS), introduced with the Goods and Services Tax. It includes examples showing how to complete a BAS. Presented by Michael Caton.

results.title: Bushy, the squirrel
results.brief_description: Designed for use in primary classes. Eight-year-old Steve discovers a squirrel frightening away the birds in his yard. He and his father find the squirrel’s home in a tree in the woods. Making trips to the woods to see Bushy, they discover other forest animals. With patience and perseverance Steve teaches the squirrel to eat from his hand.

results.title: Bushtrak
